page.title: 15THE A.1 MOTORWAY
page.content: Children at the C.of E. school wrote to Nottinghamshire County Council and to the Mininstry of Transport to find out about the A.1 Motorway.They found out that the motorway which is 15 miles long was built as a Bypass for Doncaster between 1959 and 1961.The cost of the road then was nearly Â£6 million and today the cost would be far greater than that.The road was built by a firm called Cubbitt,Fitzpatrick and Shand under the supervision of the County Council.Some people know this road as the Doncater Bypass and it is greatly used today.
